text: Na nikh (zhenakh Proroka) ne budet grekha, yesli oni budut bez pokryvala pered ikh ottsami, ikh synov'yami, ikh brat'yami, synov'yami ikh brat'yev, synov'yami ikh sester, svoimi zhenshchinami i nevol'nikami, kotorymi ovladeli ikh desnitsy. Boytes' Allakha, ved' Allakh - Svidetel' vsyakoy veshchi
